I've few tests that generically will load files & validate if the files are correct or not. I define the filenames into a String array so the test are always correctly run (more or less looping according to the array size).
The trouble is that as soon as one of the test on the files fails looping is either stopped or I don't get any feed back in the JUnit window.

Could someone give me an idea over the way to improve this ?

Tx,

Thomas,
